messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Incoming Message

Incoming subspace communication. Secure channel opened at all communication consoles.

messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Unidentified armed ship detected near the station.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Localized hyper-energetic flux wave detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Fitness Room.

messages.author: Captain's Announcement
messages.body: Attention crew, matthew has been sentanced to delimbing for the crime of murder, the process will take place in the bridge in 1 minute

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on energy emissions we detected, we believe that one of the station's bots/animals has developed clown level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Osmund Kimple (Detective)
messages.body: <font face="Verdana">When not performing the duties as the station detective, Detective Kimple also runs a private detective agency, to solve any domestic cases that may arrive. Hire today!</font>
